projects.title: E-commerce Platform Modernization
projects.description: Complete modernization of legacy e-commerce platform with microservices architecture and cloud migration.
projects.challenge: Legacy monolithic system causing performance issues and limiting scalability during peak shopping seasons.
projects.solution: Migrated to microservices architecture on AWS with auto-scaling capabilities and implemented modern frontend with React.

projects.title: Healthcare Management System
projects.description: HIPAA-compliant patient management system with real-time analytics and mobile access.
projects.challenge: Paper-based patient records causing inefficiencies and compliance issues.
projects.solution: Developed secure, cloud-based system with role-based access control and real-time patient monitoring.

projects.title: Financial Trading Platform
projects.description: Real-time trading platform with advanced analytics and risk management features.
projects.challenge: Need for low-latency trading system with real-time market data processing.
projects.solution: Built high-performance trading platform with microsecond latency and advanced risk algorithms.
